Articles.Content:
I finally had enough time to ship all 7 modules off to Minmus, land and dock them together, then send the crew and an exploration rover to check out the geography. Anyway, the base is open for business!

http://imgur.com/a/oYTVX

-Scott Kerman as base commander.

-Wehrfred Kerman as chief scientist and comic relief.

-Dean Kerman as engineer and mechanic.

-Johnsen Kerman as chief geologist and geographer.
